void ldmx::EventPrintPlugin::reset ( ) [inline]

Reset the plugin state. Turns on all print outs, sets modulus to 1, and restores default prepend and append strings.

void ldmx::EventPrintPlugin::setModulus ( unsigned  modulus) [inline]

Set the modulus which determines how often to print event messages. A modulus of 1 will print every event.

Parameters:
